More Clicks.name: More Clicks
More Clicks.description: Allows you to get more Clicks in the Clicker Game.

Reduce Rewards Cooldown.name: Reduce Rewards Cooldown
Reduce Rewards Cooldown.description: By Getting this Upgrade you can decrease the Time between the daily, weekly, monthly cooldown..

Reduce Fishing Cooldown.name: Reduce Fishing Cooldown
Reduce Fishing Cooldown.description: Reduces the cooldown time between fishing attempts.

Unlock /fish.name: Unlock /fish
Unlock /fish.description: Get the /fish and Fish everyday hour an Item!

Unlock /monthly.name: Unlock /monthly
Unlock /monthly.description: Unlock monthly rewards! Gain a random amount of XP and Gold to power up your medieval journey.

Unlock /weekly.name: Unlock /weekly
Unlock /weekly.description: Unlock weekly rewards! Gain a random amount of XP and Gold to power up your medieval journey.
